cause.description:
Today's military is 100% volunteer and there is absoloutely no reason that someone who takes medication for ADD can't serve, especially when someone with glasses can...they are the same damn thing.
It's unfair, and it's wrong, and this is the only power we really have to combat it - organizing. If enough people join this cause or one like it we can at least bring attention to this un-warranted discrimination.
1. equal rights
2. defending U.S. citizens
3. Liberty & Justice
cause.mission: promote awareness about the absurdity of the US Army's regulations against ADD soldiers and people who have been mis-diagnosed and thus also banned from the Armed Services.
cause.name: ADD = Qualified for US ARMY
